<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Reflexive Grip](/Feats.aspx?ID=2254) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [PFS Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=50) pg. 52</row>

**Archetype** [Swordmaster](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=33)

**Prerequisites**
[Swordmaster Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1139)

</column>

---

You keep hold of your weapons even when knocked out. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your Reflex DC when defending against checks to [Disarm](/Traits.aspx?ID=175) you. In addition, when you fall [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38), you don't drop any weapons that you're currently wielding, though somebody else can remove them from you.
name: Reflexive Grip
